评论概述: Nice LOOKING but pretty soft, low-quality sole and little support.  Still, there's a use case.
评论详情: So… These are fine shoes at the right price point if you want something that will look good at work but which you are not going to wear a lot or walk in extensively.  Let me explain.  They fit true to size.  They are shiny and perfectly “office” looking.  They are not uncomfortable.  But they offer little internal support.  The sole is relatively soft and squishy. I could see after just a couple days some rubber coming off the edge—see photo.  Also, the shoes are very squishy.  My feet sink into them a little as I walk.  I think this will translate to relatively quick wear of the soles, and they don’t provide enough orthopedic support to wear all day on your feet.  But for me, walking around an office from chair to chair they are nice. They are currently listed at $49.  That seems a little steep for the quality you’re getting.  They might last for a year of light use.  You could spend more and get something that would last longer and be better support for work on your feet.  3 stars at this price because of the low quality of the soles.  I think for $20 - $30 I would be forced to rate higher just given the nice appearance.
I had doubts on slip on dress shoes because I didn't think it would be secured. This is definitely more comfortable than my old shoes from k-mart. It has good cushioning for a dress shoe.
